snippet: The Vatican has ordered the bishop of Cleveland, Richard Lennon, to reopen 13 of the 50 parishes that he closed in 2010, according to advocates for the parishes.
abstract: Vatican orders the bishop of Cleveland, Richard Lennon, to reopen 13 of the 50 parishes that he closed in 2010; decision is an unprecedented win for parishioners who have fought church closings across the country in recent years.
lead_paragraph: The Vatican has ordered the bishop of Cleveland, Richard Lennon, to reopen 13 of the 50 parishes that he closed in 2010, according to advocates for the parishes.

headline.main: Ohio: Vatican Tells Bishop to Reopen Some Churches
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Vatican Tells Bishop To Reopen Some Churches
